text: Ware ga kare-ra (makka hito) no naka no 1-ri (yogen-sha muhanmado) ni keiji shite,`anata wa hitobito ni (fushinjin no ketsumatsu o) keikoku shi nasai. Mata shinkō suru mono ni wa,-nushi no omoto de sugureta ashiba o ataerareru to no, kippō o tsutae nasai.' To meijita koto ga (marryoku no) hitobito ni (sorehodo) odorokidearu no ka. (Daga) fushinjin-sha-tachi wa,`kore wa akiraka ni majutsu-shidesu.' To iu
